name: Warengine
description:
Assemble the ultimate team of fighters to crush, burn and decimate your opponents. 

  • Each fighter comes equipped with a unique selection of potential attacks, as well as a special move that defines them. Find the most powerful team and prove yourself as the most ultimate strategist. 
  • Utilize powerful status effects to give yourself an edge in every battle, or just set everything on fire. 
    • Burning - When a burning fighter triggers their Special: they'll go up in flames.
    • Targeted - When a targeted fighter takes DMG, they'll take even more.
    • Explosive - When a sparking, explosive fighter is exposed to flame: they'll detonate dealing huge DMG to themselves.
    • Guarded - A fighter that is Guarded will harmlessly deflect the next attack that comes their way.
    • Stunned - Stunned fighters will spend their turn staggering, unable to act. When a fighter loses Stunned, it will become Stun-Immune until the end of the turn.
    • Stun-Immune - Stun-Immune fighters won't become Stunned, no matter how many volts you put into them.
    • Withering - At the end of the turn, all Withering fighters' ATK is lowered by 3.
